meta.hint:
Every sentence has a naming part and an action part.
The naming part tells who or what the sentence is about.example That building is so tall.example Rocky is sad.
The action part tells something about the naming part.
The action part can tell what the naming part does. It can also
tell what the naming part is like.example That building is so tall.example Rocky is sad.

content.description:
Tell whether the part of the sentence in bold is the naming part or the action part?
Mary and Luna wrote poems.

Tell whether the part of the sentence in bold is the naming part or the action part?
Rosy dances very well.
